name: Club Polo
description:
## Club Polo

Look sharp and stylish at the farmers market with this fancy club polo that's sure to turn heads and make you stand out.

### Bumpkins.io

Deposit this wearable in Sunflower Land to equip it on your Bumpkin

### About

Bumpkins is a community driven customisable NFT project powered by Sunflower Land
